name: Attrition Rate
description: Percentage of employees who left during a given period

name: Revenue per Employee
description: Total revenue divided by the number of employees

name: Total Starts
description: Total number of new hires in a given period

name: Time to Fill
description: Average number of days to fill a job vacancy

name: Time to Hire
description: Average number of days from job posting to offer acceptance

name: Offer Acceptance Rate
description: Percentage of job offers accepted by candidates

name: Time to Productivity
description: Average time taken for new hires to reach full productivity

name: Employee Satisfaction
description: Average satisfaction score from employee surveys
